com.fluidops.fedx.algebra

Interface StatementTupleExpr

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, org.openrdf.query.algebra.QueryModelNode, QueryRef, org.openrdf.query.algebra.TupleExpr
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CheckStatementPattern, ExclusiveGroup, ExclusiveStatement, FedXStatementPattern, StatementSourcePattern

    public interface StatementTupleExpr
extends org.openrdf.query.algebra.TupleExpr, QueryRef
    Interface for any expression that can be evaluated
    Author:
    Andreas Schwarte
    See Also:
    StatementSourcePattern, ExclusiveStatement, ExclusiveGroup
